attributes.action: The British Government must act to protect the rights of Hong Kong.
attributes.additional_details: This is integral to Britain's national character, pride and standing in the world as a free, open democracy. If we do not stand up to the CCP as they tear up Hong Kong's rights, no one will.
attributes.background: The Government must condemn China's flagrant breach of the Sino-British Joint Declaration and protect the rights of Hong Kong.
